verses.text: A d'a yic schanhil ab'il yoch vinhaj Joacim yuninal vinhaj Josías reyal d'a Judá, ayic toxo ix tz'ib'chaj yuj vinhaj Baruc yuninal vinhaj Nerías tas ix val Jeremías in tic schecab' in Dios, ata' ix val d'a vinhaj Baruc chi':
A Jehová co Diosal tz'alan d'ayach icha tic: Ach Baruc, van alan icha tic: Ob'iltac in. Anhej yaelal yed' ilk'olal syak' Jehová d'ayin. Vanxo in k'unb'i voq'ui, maxtzac yal vik'an vip svab'i, xa chi.
Ina a in Jehová in, tzin satel tas ix in b'o'o, van in tok'anq'ueta tas ix vavej d'a masanil jun nación tic.

¿Tom smoj tza k'an tas tz'aj a q'uechaanh? Manhxo a k'ana', yujto ol vak'och yaelal d'a yib'anh masanil anima. Palta a in Jehová in svala', yalnhej b'aj ol ach k'ochoc, manh ol ach in cha miljocchamoc, xchi Jehová, xin chi d'a vinh.
